title: Qualitative Research Simulation for Exploring Higher Education Experiences of Students with Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic qualitative research methodology and completion of disability awareness education
context.additional_context: Project-based course exploring higher education experiences of students with disabilities through VR simulations and digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the educational environment experiences of students with disabilities from multiple perspectives through VR simulations
Learners can derive learning design requirements for students with disabilities by applying qualitative research methodologies
Learners can propose improvements to customized educational support systems for people with disabilities as project outcomes
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
